about_the_game:
Dive into a roguelike/roguelite space adventure where every level is a surprise and every map presents a unique challenge. In this action-packed game, balance strategy and adrenaline as you navigate two intense game modes and customize your gear to conquer every corner of the universe. Exclusively on PC, this journey is filled with creative mechanics and stunning visuals.

**Two Unique Game Modes:**

**Space Hunt Mode:** Play as a bounty hunter exploring diverse worlds, capturing enemies to sell for resources. Upgrade your ship, gather items, and face epic bosses across galaxies in search of rewards.

**Frenzy Mode:** Inspired by the non-stop action of games, traverse enemy-filled rooms with increasing intensity. Fight relentlessly while honing your skills and adapting to fast-paced combat.

**Unique Map Mechanics:** Each map features distinct challenges and mechanics to ensure every playthrough feels fresh:

- **Portal Gun:** Teleport strategically to attack or escape.  

- **Low Gravity:** Master your movement and aim in altered environments.  

- **Underwater Exploration:** Fight and survive in submerged, hostile zones.  

- **Open-World Areas:** Search for batteries and resources in expansive levels.  

- **Size Control:** Shrink or grow to overcome obstacles and threats.

**Complete Customization Without Extra Cost:** Personalize your hunter with a variety of skins and weapons, all unlockable through gameplay—no microtransactions required. Tailor your look and loadout to suit your playstyle.

**Stunning Visuals:** Each level blends cartoonish and photorealistic elements, creating environments that are both captivating and immersive as you explore planets and take down enemies.

Conquer challenges, embrace creativity, and dominate the universe in this unforgettable roguelike/roguelite experience!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400, Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060, Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12600K, Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060, Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Explore a roguelike/roguelite universe full of action. Hunt and sell enemies, face intense combat, and conquer maps with portals, altered gravity, and more. Two game modes offer tactical and frenetic challenges. Customize your look and weapons with no microtransactions. Conquer every room!
